org.takes.rq

Class RqSocket

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.takes.rq.RqWrap
      • org.takes.rq.RqSocket
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Request

    public final class RqSocket
extends RqWrap
    Request decorator to get custom socket headers.

    The class is immutable and thread-safe.

    Since:
    1.0
    Version:
    $Id$
    Author:
    Igor Khvostenkov (ikhvostenkov@gmail.com)
